posts.postText: I want to make one of the halloween hats, but I only have 1 refined metal. If anyone wants to donate any metal I would appreciate it.

I need some too, except ill trade some hats for them =P

Here, just look at the thread.


http://www.sourceop.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=4920

I don't know about hats, the easiest ones you can get right now are the Gibus, Midly Disturbing Halloween Mask, Pumpkin Head, and the single character masks with some of the new achievements.

However, if you're looking for an AWESOME new demoman weapon, i made a video demonstration of it. check the description for how to get it and what it does
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=60c9Ii95BMY&feature=player_embedded


(i also take donations, they help me craft shit so i can make more videos about them! :D)
